name: Groto Escape Demo
description:
This is a fully playable level using Ansimuz' GrotoEscape asset pack.

Controls: Move with arrow keys, Enter to confirm menu selection, Z to jump, X to shoot.

Additional assets have been created by the artist and they may be added to the game in the future along with various other features.

All feed back is welcome, thank you for your interest in my project

If you would like to work together on this project or another please contact me

RodentLabs@gmail.com
